data.title: Meteor storm
data.description: Spawn meteor storms around the player

settings.title: Radius
settings.description: The distance around the player to spawn a meteor storm, 1 is vanilla

settings.title: Amount
settings.description: The amount of metor storms that will spawn

data.title: Enable vehicle power
data.description: Turns the power on in the current vehicle

data.title: Disable vehicle power
data.description: Toggles the power off in the current vehicle

data.title: Toggle vehicle power
data.description: Toggles the power of the current vehicle

data.title: Refill player
data.description: Refills health, O2, H2 and energy on the player

data.title: Power up
data.description: Refills the batteries in the current vehicle

data.title: Power down
data.description: Empties the batteries in the current vehicle

settings.title: Amount
settings.description: The amount to remove from the vehicle in MWh

data.title: Enable dampeners
data.description: Enables the dampeners of either vehicle or player

data.title: Disable dampeners
data.description: Disables the dampeners of either vehicle or player

data.title: Toggle dampeners
data.description: Toggles the dampeners of either vehicle or player

data.title: Toggle thrusters
data.description: Toggles the thrusters of either vehicle or player

data.title: Toggle thrusters
data.description: Enables the thrusters of either vehicle or player

data.title: Toggle thrusters
data.description: Disables the thrusters of either vehicle or player

data.title: Fulfill buildplanner
data.description: Gives the player all items that fit from the current build planner
